Name: Save Them
About the game: A Minimalist horror-themed Platformer. Guide your way through increasingly twisted landscapes as the mysterious narrative unfolds. Not everything is as it seems - your journey to Save Them begins here. Key Features A single-player puzzle-platformer game with a unique, macabre art style 10 increasingly nightmarish stages Challenging gameplay Surreal narrative Multiple endings
